body_html:
Thanks a lot!
I want to train stuff with small "normalization-batchsize" to see how bad it performs (just for research purposes. batch renorm is a baseline to compare with in our last paper), and at the same time I want to gain the GPU efficiency of larger batch for the rest of the network. That's why I want to mix the two.

body:
Thanks a lot! 
I want to train stuff with small "normalization-batchsize" to see how bad it performs (just for research purposes. batch renorm is a baseline to compare with in our last paper), and at the same time I want to gain the GPU efficiency of larger batch for the rest of the network. That's why I want to mix the two.
